p: Lyophilized cultures of E. coli (ATCC 43894) and L. monocytogenes (ATCC 19118) were obtained from the culture collection of the Department of Microbiology, Faculty of Veterinary Medicine, Urmia, Iran, and inoculated on the surface of cheese samples before coating with the dilution of 10 6 and 10 3 (CFU/ml), respectively.
